leacrosscode:Hit.NAME: Hit
leacrosscode:Hit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:SphereSaw.NAME: Sphere Saw
leacrosscode:SphereSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

leacrosscode:Hit&Block.NAME: Hit & Block
leacrosscode:Hit&Block.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Gain !M! Protection. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:TripleHits.NAME: Triple hits
leacrosscode:TripleHits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!x2 damage to the front ennemi. Then, deal !M! damage to ALL ennemis. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:VPRCharge.NAME: VPR Chargé !
leacrosscode:VPRCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an ennemi. Apply !M! Target. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:ShockJolt.NAME: Shock Jolt !
leacrosscode:ShockJolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemis. Apply !M! Jolt to everyone.

leacrosscode:BoltDrink.NAME: Bolt Drink
leacrosscode:BoltDrink.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Max HP and draw !M! card. Gain 1 Jolt. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
leacrosscode:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards then discard up to !D! cards. Gain 1 SP for each card discarded.

leacrosscode:StaticDash.NAME: Static Dash
leacrosscode:StaticDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Apply !J! Jolt to ALL ennemis. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:VPRSpam.NAME: VPR Spam
leacrosscode:VPRSpam.DESCRIPTION: Homing !M! bullets (!D! damage each). Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.NAME: Limitless Spam
leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.DESCRIPTION: Each time you hit with a bullet, gain 1 temp Strength.
leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Bullet to your hand. NL Each time you hit with a bullet, gain 1 temp Strength.

leacrosscode:Bullet.NAME: Bullet
leacrosscode:Bullet.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Homing !M! bullet (!D! damage). NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Flashback.NAME: Flashback
leacrosscode:Flashback.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Put !M! card from your discard into your hand. It cost 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Bye.NAME: Bye
leacrosscode:Bye.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X+1 SP and X+1 strength. NL End your turn.(prob par rapport à l'effet réel de la carte)
leacrosscode:Bye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X+2 SP and 2X strength. NL End your turn.

leacrosscode:AmberBreaker.NAME: Amber Breaker
leacrosscode:AmberBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x!M! damage and apply 2x!M! Jolt to the front ennemi.

leacrosscode:SpinDance.NAME: Spin Dance
leacrosscode:SpinDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemies. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:HedgehagFarming.NAME: Hedgehag Farming
leacrosscode:HedgehagFarming.DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade 2 times a card in your hand and remove this from your deck permanently. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:RockSmash.NAME: Rock Smash
leacrosscode:RockSmash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Vigor also affect block gain. NL Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:OverloadCooling.NAME: Overload Cooling
leacrosscode:OverloadCooling.DESCRIPTION: Restore !M! points of each element. Gain 3 Vigor.

leacrosscode:Durian.NAME: Durian
leacrosscode:Durian.DESCRIPTION: Heal 8 HP and gain 2 Strength. !M! uses before removing this from your deck permanently. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:PreparingAssault.NAME: Preparing Assault
leacrosscode:PreparingAssault.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, add 3 bullet(+) in your hand.

leacrosscode:OneMoreTime.NAME: One more time
leacrosscode:OneMoreTime.DESCRIPTION: Homing 4 damage for each Bullet type cards used this fight. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:TargetAbsorb.NAME: Target Absorb
leacrosscode:TargetAbsorb.DESCRIPTION: Absorb Target from ALL ennemis and gain 1 Strength for each target. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Hackgey.NAME: Hackgey
leacrosscode:Hackgey.DESCRIPTION: Apply -!M! Strength and !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.
